verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are listening for
The most important voice we've ever heard,
For it is calling us to walk where we've not gone;
It is the voice that shook the wilderness
To bring all Israel in,
Into the fulness of the Father and the Son.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Beloved come, for I have purposed
To have you in the earth
In My full glory, in My image and in My name;
Come, mount these steps, take My hand
That I may bring you higher yet,
That in a marriage with my Son
You will be changed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We're in travail for
The most important birth we've ever seen,
Out of the union with the chosen and His Son,
To bring forth righteousness and love
From our Father God above,
Flowing through this many-membered, corporate son.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We are dying for
The most important cause we've ever known,
We are laying down our lives to gain a crown;
This is a race that must be run,
So rise up, for we have won
The war with evil, and his kingdom's coming down!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
We are beholding
The most important face we've ever seen,
It is the face of One Who walked and overcame;
He's calling us to rise in Him,
To deny self and conquer sin,
That in His likeness, we come forth bright as the sun.
